title: Markoheshkir
content: Markoheshkir Legendary 3~10 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6)+2 Bludgeoning Arcane Enchantment: You gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC and spell attack rolls.
